interface.description:
Entry point for planning process.  This is intended to be invoked from a client via the
 conversation widget. The parameters here mimic what a GenAI Procedure provides (this makes
 using it from the CW a bit easier).
interface.name: processRequest

interface.description:
Activate a collaboration for the specified instance of the "trip" entity role.  Returns the id of the
 active collaboration.
interface.name: tripActivate

parameters.description: The id of the trip to be activated.
parameters.name: entityId

parameters.description: The trip instance to be stored in the active collaboration.
parameters.name: entity

parameters.description: The (optional) name to assign to the collaboration when created
parameters.name: collaborationName

interface.description: Close the active collaboration associated with the trip instance.
interface.name: tripClose

parameters.description: The id of the trip to be closed.
parameters.name: entityId

parameters.description: Set to `true` to indicate that the collaboration failed.
parameters.name: asFailure

interface.description:
Return details about all the currently active collaborations associated with the "trip" entity role.
 The returned Object instances have the following properties:
      * collaborationId -- the id of the collaboration used to manage the active trip.
      * entity -- the current value associated with the active trip.
interface.name: tripGetActive

parameters.description: Determines whether to return the collaborations created by the current user (the default) or by all users.
parameters.name: forAllUsers

interface.description: Update the specified instance of the "trip" entity role in its active collaboration (if one exists).
interface.name: tripUpdateActive

parameters.description: The id of the trip to be updated.
parameters.name: entityId

parameters.description: The updated instance of the specified trip.
parameters.name: entity
